onbon.y2

Class Y2BulletinManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.Y2BulletinManager

  • public class Y2BulletinManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The manager provides functions to control bulletins areas.

    Invoke screen.bulletin() to get a instance.

    Author:
    ONBON

        Returns:

             throws Y2Exception

        Returns:

             throws Y2Exception
